title: Advanced Dynamic Programming Techniques
description: Explore more advanced concepts in Dynamic Programming including memoization, tabulation, and optimization techniques.
data:
### Advanced Dynamic Programming
In this article, we delve into more advanced DP techniques like memoization, tabulation, and state compression.

#### Memoization
Memoization is a technique used to optimize recursive solutions by storing previously computed results.

#### Tabulation
Tabulation is the bottom-up approach where we solve the problem by filling a table with computed values.
